general.name: Gjin Rexhaj
general.headline: Aspiring Software Engineer
about: Hello! My name is Gjin Rexhaj, and I am a third-year university student. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a minor in Mathematics.
In addition to being a computer enthusiast, I am somewhat of a sound design nerd. One of my hobbies includes the creation of Oscilloscope Music.

experiences.title: Firmware Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Multi-faceted role which dealt with IoT solutions research and testing, and developing algorithms for radar sensor vector stabilization.

education.subject: Computer Science
education.description: Major in Computer Science, minor in Mathematics. Honors program member, GPA: 3.75 / 4.0

volunteering.description: Workload dealt with the ordering, assembly, and installation of wiring harnesses and advanced avionics systems for small form-factor propeller engine aircraft.

projects.name: Graphing Calculator Application
projects.description: A Python GUI application created with PySide6 and matplotlib which graphs user-specified arbitrary mathematical functions on a two-dimensional cartesian plane

projects.name: Sierpinski Fractal Generator
projects.description: A Java GUI program created with Swing and AWT which renders an "nth" order Sierpinski fractal.
